ModMetaData.name: [XND] Watermill Tweaks
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description: Changes the watermill generator in several different ways: * It now requires a research project called 'Hydroelectricity' * Increases its base power production from 1100W to 1400W * Its power production decreases if outdoor temperatures are below 10째C (50째F) or above 90째C (194째F) * Adds a new incident called 'Turbulent waters' which increases watermill power production by 50% but also damages them over time
